en.title: Meineke
en.disconnect: Failed to Connect to Server. Retrying...
en.conn_refused: Server Connection Denied. Try updating Meineke.

setup.restart: Please restart Meineke to apply your changes.

chose_notifications.title: Minimum Alert Magnitude
chose_notifications.line1: Choose a Minimum Magnitude Size to be notified of.

enable_notifications.title: Notifications
enable_notifications.line1: If enabled, you will receive notifications from server.
enable_notifications.line2: (The notifications will be receive from a specific channel)

dev_mode.title: Development Mode
dev_mode.line1: If enabled, you will have access to debug tools that are using during development.
dev_mode.line2: (Only enable this option if you know what you're doing!)

ro.title: Meineke
ro.disconnect: Eroare la conexiunea de server. Incercand...
ro.conn_refused: Server Connection Denied. Try updating Meineke.

setup.restart: Please restart Meineke to apply your changes.

chose_notifications.title: Minimum Alert Magnitude
chose_notifications.line1: Choose a Minimum Magnitude Size to be notified of.

enable_notifications.title: Notificari
enable_notifications.line1: Daca sunt activate, veti primi notificari de la server
enable_notifications.line2: (Notificarile vor fi primite de la un canal specific!)

dev_mode.title: Mod de dezvoltare
dev_mode.line1: Daca este activat , ve-ti avea acces la uneltele de dezvoltare
dev_mode.line2: (Activati aceasta optiunde doar daca stiti ce faceti!)
